long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Storage Tool product provides easy access to managing local data storage across sites.

- Manage your storage by adding and deleting the data you need.
- The product interface is intuitive and easy to use, making it accessible even to users without special technical knowledge.
- Storage tool provides information about current disk space usage, allowing users to monitor resource usage.
